children.name: Jamf Protect - Alerts Overview
children.description: Overview of events from Alerts & Unified Logs
children.title: Jamf Protect - Alerts Overview

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  caid
| json "input.match.severity" as severity
| json "input.host.hostname" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where severity = 3
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count by severity

$$logsrc  caid
| json "input.match.severity" as severity
| json "input.host.hostname" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where severity = 2
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count by severity

$$logsrc  caid
| json "input.match.severity" as severity
| json "input.host.hostname" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where severity = 1
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count by severity

(($$logsrc ) caid)
| formatDate(_messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "etc/utc") as time
| json field=_raw "input.host.hostname", "input.match.severity", "input.eventType", "input.match.facts[0].human" as hostname, severity, eventType, description
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where severity > 0
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| if (%"input.match.actions[0].name" matches "Prevented", "Blocked",
if (%"input.match.actions[1].name" matches "Prevented", "Blocked",
if (%"input.match.actions[2].name" matches "Prevented", "Blocked",
if (%"input.match.facts[0].name" matches "XProtectDetection", "Blocked", 
if (%"input.match.facts[0].name" matches "GatekeeperBlocked*", "Blocked", "Allowed"))))) as action
| if (!isNull(%"input.match.event.matchValue"), %"input.match.event.matchValue",
if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[2].name"), concat(%"input.match.facts[2].name","\n",%"input.match.facts[1].name","\n",%"input.match.facts[0].name"),
if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[1].name"), concat(%"input.match.facts[1].name","\n" ,%"input.match.facts[0].name"),
if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[0].name"), %"input.match.facts[0].name","unknown")))) as signature
| if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[2].human"), concat(%"input.match.facts[2].human","\n",%"input.match.facts[1].human","\n",%"input.match.facts[0].human"),
if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[1].human"), concat(%"input.match.facts[1].human","\n",%"input.match.facts[0].human"),
if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[0].human"), %"input.match.facts[0].human","unknown"))) as description
| replace(severity,"3","High") as severity
| replace(severity,"2","Medium") as severity
| replace(severity,"1","Low") as severity
| count time, action, hostname, signature, description, severity
| sort by time
| fields -_count

$$logsrc  caid
| timeslice 1d
| json "input.match.severity" as severity
| json "input.host.hostname" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where severity>0
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| replace(severity,"3","High") as severity
| replace(severity,"2","Medium") as severity
| replace(severity,"1","Low") as severity
| count _timeslice, severity
| transpose row _timeslice column severity

$$logsrc  caid
| timeslice 1d
| json "input.host.hostname" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"input.match.severity" > 0
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count by _timeslice

$$logsrc  caid
| json "input.eventType","input.host.hostname" as eventType,hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"input.match.severity">0
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| replace(eventType,"GPThreatMatchExecEvent","Threat Prevention") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"GPDownloadEvent","Download Event") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"GPFSEvent","File System Event") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"GPGatekeeperEvent","Gatekeeper Event") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"GPPreventedExecutionEvent","Custom Prevention") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"GPProcessEvent","Process Event") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"auth-mount","Device Controls") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"GPClickEvent","Synthetic Click Event") as eventType
| replace(eventType,"GPUSBEvent","USB Event") as eventType
| count eventType

$$logsrc  caid
AND GPThreatMatchExecEvent
| json "input.eventType","input.match.event.matchValue","input.host.hostname" as eventType,threat,hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count threat

$$logsrc  caid
| json "input.host.hostname" as Hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"input.match.severity" > 0
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count Hostname
| sort by _count

$$logsrc  caid
auth-mount  
| json field=_raw "input.match.facts[1].name","input.host.hostname" as detection_name,hostname
| where detection_name = "EnforcedRemovableDevicePolicy"
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count by detection_name

$$logsrc  caid
auth-mount
| json "input.host.hostname", "input.match.event.device.vendorName", "input.match.event.device.productName", "input.match.event.device.productId", "input.match.event.device.isEncrypted" as Hostname, Vendor, Name, ProductId,
 Encrpytion_Status
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| concat (Vendor, " ",Name) as Device
| count Hostname, Device
| order by _count

$$logsrc  caid
GPGatekeeperEvent
| json "input.eventType","input.match.facts[0].name" as eventType,event
| json "input.host.hostname" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| count event

$$logsrc  caid
GPGatekeeperEvent
| json "input.match.facts[0].name", "input.match.event.path" as Block_Type, Executable
| json "input.host.hostname" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| count Block_Type, Executable
| order by _count desc
| top 10 Block_Type, Executable by _count

($$logsrc 
GPUnifiedLogEvent) 
AND "com.apple.XProtectFramework.PluginAPI"
| timeslice 1d
| json "input.host.hostname","input.match.event.composedMessage", "input.match.event.process" as hostname,event,module
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| parse regex field=Event "status_message\"\:\"(?<Status>[a-zA-Z\W]+)\"\,"
| parse regex field=Event "execution_duration\"\:(?<Duration>[\d+\W\w]+)\}"
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| count by _timeslice, hostname, module, status, duration
| fields - _count
| sort by _timeslice

$$logsrc  caid
| json "input.eventType", "input.match.facts[0].name","input.host.hostname" as eventtype,event,hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where eventType != "GPUnifiedLogEvent"
| dedup %"input.match.uuid"
| if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[2].name"), concat(%"input.match.facts[2].name","\n",%"input.match.facts[1].name","\n",%"input.match.facts[0].name"),
if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[1].name"), concat(%"input.match.facts[1].name","\n" ,%"input.match.facts[0].name"),
if (!isNull(%"input.match.facts[0].name"), %"input.match.facts[0].name","unknown"))) as event
| count eventType,event
| order by _count desc 
| top 10 eventType, event by _count

children.name: Jamf Protect - Telemetry Overview
children.description: Overview of events from Telemetry stream
children.title: Jamf Protect - Telemetry Overview

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc  !caid
| json "host_info.host_name" as Hostname
| where %"host_info.host_name" matches "{{hostname}}"
| count Hostname
| sort _count desc

$$logsrc  !caid
| formatDate(_receiptTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "etc/utc") as Date
| json "host_info.host_name", "subject.audit_user_name", "exec_env.env.SUDO_COMMAND" as Hostname, Elevated_User, Compiled_Arguments
| where Hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"identity.signer_id" = "com.apple.sudo"
| where %"subject.effective_user_name" = "root" 
| where %"subject.audit_user_name" != ""
| count Date, Hostname, Elevated_User, Compiled_Arguments
| order by Date
| fields -_count

$$logsrc  !caid
| formatDate(_messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", "etc/utc") as Date
| json "header.event_name", "return.description", "host_info.host_name", "subject.terminal_id.ip_address", "subject.effective_user_name", "exec_args.args_compiled" as EventName, Return, Hostname, IPAddress, User, Args
| where Hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where IPAddress != "0.0.0.0"
| where EventName = "AUE_SESSION_START" or EventName = "AUE_EXECVE" or EventName = "AUE_openssh"
| count Date, EventName, Return, Hostname, IPAddress, User, Args
| order by Date
| fields -_count

$$logsrc  !caid
| json field=_raw "subject.audit_user_name","texts","return.error","host_info.host_name" as Username, texts, return_error, Hostname
| where %"host_info.host_name" matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"subject.process_name" = "/System/Library/Frameworks/Security.framework/Versions/A/MachServices/authorizationhost.bundle/Contents/MacOS/authorizationhost" 
| where %"header.event_name" = "AUE_auth_user" or %"header.event_name" = "AUE_lw_login"
| if(return_error = 0,1,0) as success
| if(return_error != 0,1,0) as failure
| values(process_exec) as ProcessExec, sum(failure) as failure, sum(success) as success, values(return_error) as return_error, values(%"return.description") AS ReturnDesc, values(texts) as Texts, values(Hostname) as Hostname, count by Username
| count by Hostname, Username, success, failure
| fields Hostname, Username, success, failure
| sum(failure) as Total_Failure

$$logsrc  !caid
| json field=_raw "subject.audit_user_name","texts","return.error","host_info.host_name" as Username, texts, return_error, Hostname
| where %"host_info.host_name" matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"subject.process_name" = "/System/Library/CoreServices/loginwindow.app/Contents/MacOS/loginwindow" 
| where %"header.event_id" = 45023
| if(return_error = 0,1,0) as success
| if(return_error != 0,1,0) as failure
| values(process_exec) as ProcessExec, sum(failure) as failure, sum(success) as success, values(return_error) as return_error, values(%"return.description") AS ReturnDesc, values(texts) as Texts, values(Hostname) as Hostname, count by Username
| count by Hostname, Username, success, failure
| fields Hostname, Username, success, failure
| sum(failure) as Total_Failure

$$logsrc  !caid
| json field=_raw "subject.audit_user_name","texts","return.error","host_info.host_name" as Username, texts, return_error, Hostname
| parse regex field=texts "mechanism\s(?<auth_mech>\w+)\:(?<auth_mech_verb>\w+)\,(?<auth_mech_rights>\w+)"
| where %"host_info.host_name" matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"header.event_name" = "AUE_ssauthmech"
| where %"subject.audit_user_name" != "-1"
| where auth_mech_rights = "privileged"
| where auth_mech_verb = "authenticate"
| if(return_error = 0,1,0) as success
| if(return_error != 0,1,0) as failure
| values(process_exec) as ProcessExec, sum(failure) as failure, sum(success) as success, values(return_error) as return_error, values(%"return.description") AS ReturnDesc, values(texts) as Texts, values(Hostname) as Hostname, count by Username
| count by Hostname, Username, success, failure
| fields Hostname, Username, success, failure
| sum(failure) as Total_Failure

$$logsrc  !caid
| json field=_raw "subject.audit_user_name","texts","return.error","host_info.host_name" as Username, texts, return_error, Hostname
| where %"host_info.host_name" matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"header.event_name" = "AUE_auth_user"
| where %"subject.process_name" = "/usr/bin/sudo"
| if(return_error = 0,1,0) as success
| if(return_error != 0,1,0) as failure
| values(process_exec) as ProcessExec, sum(failure) as failure, sum(success) as success, values(return_error) as return_error, values(%"return.description") AS ReturnDesc, values(texts) as Texts, values(Hostname) as Hostname, count by Username
| count by Hostname, Username, success, failure
| fields Hostname, Username, success, failure
| sum(failure) as Total_Failure

$$logsrc  !caid
| json field=_raw "subject.audit_user_name","texts","return.error","host_info.host_name" as Username, texts, return_error, Hostname
| where %"host_info.host_name" matches "{{hostname}}"
| where %"header.event_name" = "AUE_openssh"
| if(return_error = 0,1,0) as success
| if(return_error != 0,1,0) as failure
| values(process_exec) as ProcessExec, sum(failure) as failure, sum(success) as success, values(return_error) as return_error, values(%"return.description") AS ReturnDesc, values(texts) as Texts, values(Hostname) as Hostname, count by Username
| count by Hostname, Username, success, failure
| fields Hostname, Username, success, failure
| sum(failure) as Total_Failure

$$logsrc  !caid
| json "host_info.host_name" as Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="0.0.0.0")
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="127.0.0.1")
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="::")
| where !isnull(%"socket_inet.ip_address")
| %"socket_inet.ip_address" as dest_ip
| fields -%"socket_inet.ip_address"
| geoip dest_ip
| count by latitude, longitude
| where !isnull(latitude)
| where !isnull(longitude)

$$logsrc  !caid
| json "host_info.host_name" as Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="0.0.0.0")
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="127.0.0.1")
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="::")
| where !isnull(%"socket_inet.ip_address")
| %"socket_inet.ip_address" as dest_ip
| fields -%"socket_inet.ip_address"
| geoip dest_ip
| count by country_name 
| where !isnull(country_name)
| sort by _count desc

$$logsrc  !caid
| timeslice 1d
| json field=_raw "subject.process_name","exec_chain_child.parent_path","exec_chain.thread_uuid","host_info.host_name" as Process, ParentProcess, ThreadUuid, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| count Hostname, Process, ParentProcess
| sort by _count asc 
| limit 50

$$logsrc  !caid
| json field=_raw "host_info.host_name" as hostname
| where hostname matches "{{hostname}}"
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="0.0.0.0")
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="127.0.0.1")
| where !(%"socket_inet.ip_address"="::")
| where !isnull(%"socket_inet.ip_address")
| %"socket_inet.ip_address" as dest_ip
| fields -%"socket_inet.ip_address"
| values(%"host_info.host_name") as hostname, values(dest_ip) as dest_ip, count by %"subject.process_name",%"exec_chain_child.parent_path"
| fields _count, hostname, %"subject.process_name",%"exec_chain_child.parent_path"
| sort _count desc

children.name: Jamf Security Cloud - Threat Stream
children.description: Overview of events from network threat stream
children.title: Jamf Security Cloud - Threat Stream

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| json field=_raw "event.action", "event.metadata.product","event.device.userDeviceName" as action, product, hostname
| where hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" AND action = "Blocked"
| dedup event.timestamp
| count by action

$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| dedup event.timestamp
| json field=_raw "event.action", "event.metadata.product","event.device.userDeviceName" as action, product, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" AND !isBlank(Hostname)
| count Hostname
| sort _count desc

$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| timeslice 1d
| dedup event.timestamp
| json field=_raw "event.action","event.metadata.product","event.severity","event.device.userDeviceName" as action, product, severity, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" AND action = "Blocked"
| replace(severity,"10","Very High") as severity
| replace(severity,"8","High") as severity
| replace(severity,"6","Medium") as severity
| replace(severity,"4","Low") as severity
| replace(severity,"2","Very Low") as severity
| count _timeslice, severity
| transpose row _timeslice column severity

$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| timeslice 1d
| dedup event.timestamp
| json field=_raw "event.metadata.product", "event.eventType.description", "event.device.userDeviceName" as product, eventType, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" AND !isBlank(eventType)
| count _timeslice, eventType
| transpose row _timeslice column eventType

$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| timeslice 1d
| dedup event.timestamp
| json field=_raw "event.metadata.product", "event.eventType.description", "event.device.userDeviceName" as product, eventType, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" AND !isBlank(eventType)
| count eventType

$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| dedup event.timestamp
| json field=_raw "event.action", "event.metadata.product", "event.destination.name", "event.device.userDeviceName" as action, product, Domain, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" and !isBlank(Domain)
| count Domain
| order by _count desc
| top 10 Domain by _count

$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| dedup event.timestamp
| json field=_raw "event.action", "event.metadata.product","event.destination.ip","event.device.userDeviceName" as action, product, IP_Address, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" and !isBlank(IP_Address)
| count IP_Address
| order by _count desc
| top 10 IP_Address by _count

($$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream")
| dedup event.timestamp
| json field=_raw "event.metadata.product", "event.eventType.description", "event.device.userDeviceName" as product, eventType, Hostname
| where Hostname matches "{{Hostname}}"
| where product = "Threat Events Stream" AND eventType contains "Risky Host"
| fields Hostname, eventType, %"event.destination.name", %"event.destination.ip"
| count Hostname
| sort _count desc

sourceDefinition.query:
$$logsrc1  !"Network Traffic Stream"
| json field=_raw "event.device.userDeviceName" as Hostname
